attributes.action: Pension Change for ex Military persons.
attributes.additional_details:
Change the regulations for Forces Pentions for all serving personal that served before the last regulation change.
Allowing, as for most  non governmental schemes for a part pension for years served after 5 years service. For ex sample,  for 10.5 years service 50% of a full 21 years service.   At the moment many veterans that served before the last review, and did not complete a full 21 years recieve nothing for the time served. If they had worked in a firm with a pension scheme they would have recieved a proportional pension for the time served.
